title: The Free Life
lyrics:
And while I certainly try not to forget
I can’t remember this
And while I never ever try not to regret
I can’t ever resist
And now I wouldn’t be who I think am
If I was not myself

And so I always try to remember

We put wonder over wealth



Science

Magic

All things in between

Freedom

Free will

The free life is a dream



And so we keeping on being just like us

So we can always sleep

And while we never thought any more than this

These promises we keep



Science

Magic

All things in between

Freedom

Free will

The free life is a dream



So dream on like you should

Dream on somewhere good



Why do we care

If anybody’s there

Time keeps ticking

Why do we care

If anybody’s out there



Why do we care

If anybody’s out there

Time keeps ticking

Why do we care

If anybody’s there



And while I certainly try not to forget

I can’t remember this

And while I never ever try not to regret

I can’t ever resist

And so I always to remember

That these wonders still exist



You’re just like us now

Stop looking away, do it

Away



Science

Magic

All things in between

Freedom

Free will

The free life is a dream
